sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for May 1 - 2

event: Starting Monday 5/10 on W Short St at N Mill St and N Upper St.
Signals will be flashing red All-Way stops from 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. each evening.
Signals will be normal Red-Yellow-Green at all other times.
